front.title: Path Computation Element (PCE) Discovery using Domain Name System(DNS)

abstract.t: Discovery of the Path Computation Element (PCE) within an IGP area or routing domain is possible using OSPF [RFC5088] and IS-IS [RFC5089]. However, it has been established that in certain deployment scenarios PCEs may not wish, or be able to participate within the IGP process. In those scenarios, it is beneficial for the Path Computation Client (PCC) (or other PCE) to discover PCEs via an alternative mechanism to those proposed in [RFC5088] and [RFC5089]. This document specifies the requirements, use cases, procedures and extensions to support PCE type and capability discovery via DNS.
